lookup_rate.map: function(doc) { emit(doc.prefix, {'routes': doc.routes, 'rate_cost': doc.rate_cost, 'rate_increment': doc.rate_increment, 'rate_minimum': doc.rate_minimum, 'rate_surcharge': doc.rate_surcharge, 'weight': doc.weight, 'options':doc.options, 'direction':doc.direction, 'rate_name':doc.rate_name}); }
